Plot: All hell breaks loose when the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.
Title: Meet the Fockers
Writer: Greg Glienna (characters), Mary Ruth Clarke (characters), Jim Herzfeld (story), Marc Hyman (story), Jim Herzfeld (screenplay), John Hamburg (screenplay)
Actors: Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Dustin Hoffman, Barbra Streisand
tomatoConsensus: Talented cast is wasted as the movie is content with recycling jokes from its predecessor, Meet the Parents.
